20-001FA.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Finance Authority of Long Beach meeting held Thursday, October 24, 2019.A motion was made by Member Gross, seconded by Member Nakamoto, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 1 of 2TELECONFERENCE, 9:00 AMTUESDAY, MAY 26, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHFINANCE AUTHORITY OF LONG BEACH MINUTESYes: 2 - Gross and NakamotoAbsent: 1 - Modica2.

20-002FA.summary: Recommendation to authorize resolution to execute a Revolving Line of Credit in an amount not to exceed $25,000,000 for a one-year term, with the option to extend the term for an additional one-year period.A motion was made by Member Gross, seconded by Member Nakamoto, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. F.A.L.B. 2020-01.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Gross and NakamotoAbsent: 1 - ModicaEnactment No: F.A.L.B. 2020-013.
